ping.name: ping
ping.description: Sends latency of Discord and bot

avatar.name: avatar
avatar.description: Sends avatar of the specified user

delete.name: delete
delete.description: Deletes messages sent to a channel

number_option.name: number
number_option.description: enter the amount of numbers you will delete

play.name: play
play.description: Plays audio from YouTube or SoundCloud.

forward.name: forward
forward.description: fast forwards by the entered seconds

forward_option.name: seconds
forward_option.description: the seconds you want to fast forward

rewind.description: used to rewind within the currently playing song

jump.name: jump
jump.description: skips to the next song according to the selected number.

now_playing.name: now_playing
now_playing.description: provides information about the currently playing song

volume_option.name: volume
volume_option.description: to adjust the volume, enter numbers as %
